text: after the attack I had no face I wanted
to die
but now I have a cause and I'm a hope
for others my name is Natalia Ponce de
Leon
I went to the door and there was this
man he poured the liquid all over my
face and body I screamed my clothes
melted away then my own skin started to
fall off in the beginning I was full of
hate I wanted revenge I did not want to
leave but in the hospital I met other
acid attack victims it was there that I
decided to create my foundation I felt I
had to help
the law was a major breakthrough but we
still have another big project to build
a specialist burns unit in a hospital we
do not have one in Colombia
my daily routine has changed a lot after
the attack I wasn't able to walk I was
fed through a straw and I could not
tolerate light
when I was given a mirror I did not have
a face it was not me I had to wear a
mask and hide my face from the world now
I do not need the mask and I am not
scared of the mirror anymore but the
mask has helped me reach out to others
we help victims get access to health
care and we support them to find jobs
and reintegrate into society I've met
some brave women they think I'm strong
but they are much stronger they give me
the power to keep going and I've become
their hope and their voice I'd filled my
life with love I'm a happy woman
